title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 15 April 2014 - XWiki
content:

09:51 <OSIMasson> has quit  
10:06 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
10:24 <woshilapin> Hi devs, I tried to build the master branch of xwiki-platform and didn't succeeded if my locale is not 'en\_US.UTF-8', is it normal?  
10:26 <woshilapin> Because, I was surprised that I need to define a specific locale to build it  
10:26 <woshilapin> The error comes from a unit test in XWikiMessageToolBridgeTest  
10:28 <tmortagne> woshilapin: what is the message ?  
10:29 <woshilapin> Sorry, I thought I have kept it but my shell history is not enough long now  
10:29 <woshilapin> But it was something like  
10:29 <woshilapin> Expected <Langu[ag]e> but have <Langu[]e>  
10:30 <tmortagne> ok, sounds like something is counting too much on the system language in that test, if you can reproduce it again it would be nice to create a jira issue and I will look at it  
10:32 <woshilapin> Ok, I'll try to reproduce it now and create a JIRA on it (I think it's just "cloning", set locale to "fr\_FR.UTF-8" then "mvn clean install"; I'll try and report)  
10:33 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
10:34 <tmortagne> woshilapin: ok thanks  
10:41 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
10:41 <vmassol> good morning  
10:56 <cjd> gm  
11:12 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
11:16 <tmortagne> [WARN] I plan to start maven/git release for 6.0RC1 in about 2 or 3h, tell me if you have any blockers not listed in jira. Jenkins seems stable enough  
11:22 <vmassol> @tmortagne: cool  
11:31 <vmassol> tmortagne: why did you revert the commit for XWIKI-10247 on 5.4.5? Too dangerous somehow?  
11:32 <tmortagne> vmassol: there is no such thing as ContentParser in 5.4 branch it seems so that merge was actually totally broken  
11:32 <tmortagne> the required change is a big change so yes sounds too dangerous to me  
11:33 <tmortagne> basically what is needed here is XWIKI-10248  
11:35 <vmassol> ok, strange I'd have thought that ContentParser is something old  
11:35 <vmassol> I see  
11:39 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: hi, do you think you could look at http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-9934?focusedCommentId=80383&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-80383 when you get some time? Just to make sure it's not a real problem that we need to fix quickly.  
11:40 <gdelhumeau> vmassol: as I have seen, it is not related to the jira issue  
11:40 <vmassol> ok but is it still a problem we need to fix?  
11:41 <gdelhumeau> actually the description is very poor  
11:41 <gdelhumeau> but it seems we have the same problem on http://www.xwiki.com/lang/en/BlogFr/BlogFrTemplate  
11:41 <tmortagne> vmassol: we have at 2 different ContentParser ;)  
11:41 <tmortagne> 3 not 2  
11:42 <tmortagne> this DefaultContentParser is a new helper added by denis  
11:43 <vmassol> tmortagne: ah ok :)  
11:44 <tmortagne> but anyway modifying it is not enough to dully support syntax installed as extension, there is other places that still get the syntaxes through Utils  
11:45 <gdelhumeau> vmassol: it looks like an error on the velocity code  
11:45 <vmassol> gdelhumeau:  
11:45 <gdelhumeau> I mean, at  least concerning the xwiki.com blof  
11:45 <gdelhumeau> \*blog  
11:45 <vmassol> so do we need a new jira issue?  
11:46 <gdelhumeau> probably yes, but the description is not sufficient IMO to create a precise one  
11:48 <vmassol> ok maybe you could comment then to ask him to create a new issue and explain what addition details he needs to provide?  
11:53 <vmassol> gtg for early lunch, bbl  
11:58 <vmassol> has quit

15:05 <tmortagne> [ANN] starting the git/maven release for 6.0RC1, hold you commits on master please  
15:41 <msmeria> has quit  
15:41 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
15:51 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
16:02 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
16:26 <tmortagne> vmassol: the enforcer rule that is supposed to check if <version> is valid in our build does not seems to work anymore, I fixed one mistake when I released 6.0M2 and I'm fixing another one now  
16:26 <tmortagne> the LDAP auth dependency in https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-enterprise/blob/master/xwiki-enterprise-web/pom.xml  
16:33 <vmassol> tmortagne: you mean the check for project.version vs commons.version/platform.version, etc?  
16:33 <tmortagne> yes  
16:33 <tmortagne> I just fixed a project.version to platform.version  
16:35 <vmassol> tmortagne:  
16:35 <vmassol> not sure it ever existed in enterprise  
16:35 <vmassol> I can see it defined in platform  
16:35 <vmassol> but not in enterprise  
16:36 <vmassol> in platform: https://gist.githubusercontent.com/vmassol/10737661/raw/c408ac397c8141d424ecaffc66cbd138474ac79d/gistfile1.txt  
16:37 <vmassol> should be simple to add though  
16:38 <vmassol> (it also exists in rendering btw)  
16:40 <tmortagne> vmassol: I tough it was everywhere, like defined in commons-pom since we need it everywhere  
16:41 <vmassol> no because the rules depend on where you are  
16:41 <vmassol> the check is generic and is in  a java class but the application of it is root-project specific  
16:46 <vmassol> let me make the change  
16:47 <tmortagne> thanks  
16:49 <msmeria> has quit  
16:54 <vmassol> arg macdonald won't let git commands go through...  
16:54 <vmassol> port 22 is closed  
16:54 <vmassol> let me paste my change  
16:54 <tmortagne> you can use github https ? (or github UI directly actually)  
16:54 <tmortagne> s/?/:)/  
16:55 <vmassol> indeed trying that (github ui)  
16:55 <tmortagne> [ANN] git/maven release of 6.0RC1 is now done  
16:55 <tmortagne> be carefull, master is not 6.1-SNAPSHOT  
16:55 <tmortagne> so more cherry-pick  
16:56 <tmortagne> s/not/now/  
16:56 <tmortagne> (bad reflexes, bad)  
16:56 <vmassol> hmm can someone merge on 6.0 branch? :)  
16:57 <vmassol> just pushed on master
